plugins.name: Unidup
plugins.description:
Create a design set template that includes component usage and color schemes. With this plugin, you can duplicate your template to a new page, automatically apply new instances of the original component's new variants under consistent layers, and create brand new color schemes.


Additionally, color schemes can be exported in JSON format.



Document Preparation


Document Structure: Prepare the design drafts of the design scheme, which should include "Components Page" and "Template Page", as well as "Color Scheme".


Naming: Each reuse of the design scheme should have a unique name, let's tentatively call it "NAME". This naming is very important as it runs through the entire reuse process.


Template Page: The "Template Page" is the page of your design scheme, and its name should be called NAME. It will play a big role in subsequent work, transforming into various new outputs and serving various new purposes. Therefore, each artboard should contain instances of components for reuse.


Components Page: Each time the design scheme is reused, the output should be unique. The "Components Page" contains unique elements in each set of outputs, and each component should include variants, with the key of the variant being "name" and the value being NAME, to correspond with each set of outputs.


Color Scheme: The naming method for local color schemes in figma is xxx/xxx. When naming, please follow the structure NAME/color1, NAME/color2.



How to Use


Duplicate and Export JSON are two main functions.


Duplicate:

There are three cards in the interface, namely "Components Page", "From Template", and "New Page Naming".


  1. Select your "Components Page", click the "Apply Selected Page" button to the right of "Components Page", and the card will display the details of the "Components Page".
  2. Select your "Template Page", click the "Apply Selected Page" button to the right of "From template", and the card will display the details of the "Template Page".
  3. In the "New Page Naming" card, name your new output.
  4. Click the "Duplicate" button, and you have extended a new output from the "Template Page". Modify the associated components and color scheme, and this output is ready.



Export JSON:

It will list the NAME of all your output schemes, click to export the rgba color values, and download the json to your local.




See usage demo file:

https://www.figma.com/file/jUg3U53QSIzWBEn0RfUdB0/
plugins.tagline: Unidup - An easy way to reuse your design set

plugins.name: FigmaLint
plugins.description:
FigmaLint is an AI-powered design analysis tool that helps designers and developers create more consistent, accessible, and production-ready components.


Key Features:

  1. 🔍 Component Analysis - Get instant insights into component structure, properties, states, and design token usage
  2. 💬 AI Chat Assistant - Ask questions about design systems, best practices, and get contextual help
  3. 🎯 MCP Integration - Enhanced analysis with design systems knowledge for better recommendations
  4. 🏆 Audit Scoring - Comprehensive scoring for accessibility, consistency, and code-readiness
  5. 🎨 Token Analysis - Identify hard-coded values and get semantic token recommendations
  6. 📋 Property Documentation - Auto-generate property sheets and developer handoff documentation


Perfect for:

  1. Design system teams building scalable component libraries
  2. Developers who need clear component specifications
  3. Designers wanting to improve component quality and consistency
  4. Teams looking to streamline design-to-code handoff


How it works:

  1. Select any component in your Figma file
  2. Click "Analyze" to get instant insights
  3. Review recommendations for improvements
  4. Use the AI chat for specific questions
  5. Export documentation for developers


FigmaLint uses Claude AI to provide intelligent analysis and the MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for design systems best practices, ensuring your components are production-ready and follow industry standards.

accepted.name: TJ Pitre
accepted.description: Connecting the dots between design systems, AI, and the product development lifecycle.

plugins.tagline: AI-powered component analysis and design systems chat for Figma

plugins.name: Components Explorer
plugins.description:
Component Explorer allows you to easily locate and manage all your components, both local and remote, and easily find all their instances.


**Key Features:**


• View all your components in one place, organized by name or grouped by page


• Quickly filter between local and remote components


• Find specific components with instant search


• Locate all instances of a component with a single click


• Navigate directly to any component or instance in your document


Thanks for your feedback!


https://buymeacoffee.com/4bulxx2uho

accepted.name: Alex Salmerón
accepted.description: Hello! 🚀 I'm Alex Salmerón, a Product Designer (UX/UI) specializing in Design Systems.

plugins.tagline: Locate and manage your components and instances effortlessly

plugins.name: Data Bloom
plugins.description:
Data Bloom is your go-to plugin for breathing life into your Figma designs. Easily replace generic dummy text with real-looking, localized content and user data tailored to your audience. Now supporting 10 languages with 10+ data type options (see below), Data Bloom will continue expanding to include more languages and data types.


Supported languages:

🇦🇿 Azerbaijani, 🇺🇸 English (USA), 🇩🇪 German, 🇰🇿 Kazakh, 🇰🇬 Kyrgyz, 🇷🇺 Russian, 🇹🇷 Turkish, 🇹🇲 Turkmen, 🇺🇦 Ukrainian, 🇺🇿 Uzbek


Available data types:

🎲 Random: Generates a data point by randomly selecting from any of the other available data types.

👫🏻 Names: Creates realistic first names, last names, or full names, with options for gender.

🤪 Playful Usernames: Produces fun and quirky usernames, optionally starting with an "@" symbol.

📞 Phone Numbers: Generates phone numbers with various formatting options, including country-specific domestic styles.

💳 Payment card details: Helps to generate mock payment card information, such as Card numbers, Expiry date and CVV/CVC

⭐️ Ratings and reviews: Generate localized generic review text from categories like "General", "Product specific" or "App feedback"

📆 Date: Creates date values with customizable formats and selectable year ranges, including custom inputs.

📆 Days of the week: Inserts day names (e.g., Monday, Tuesday)

📆 Months: Populates layers with month names (e.g., January, February)

💼 Professions: Populates layers with a diverse list of job titles and occupations.

🎨 Colors: Replaces selected text layers with common color names.


Whether you’re designing a prototype or building a demo, Data Bloom makes it effortless to populate text layers in seconds, ensuring your prototypes feel authentic, personalized, and polished.


✦ Lightning-fast generation

✦ Realistic, localized data (Names, Phone Numbers, Colors, Usernames and Professions)

✦ Lightweight and Figma-friendly

✦ Continuous updates with new languages and data types


Replace “lorem ipsum” forever — grow your designs with Data Bloom.


🌱 How-to Guide:

  1. Run the Data Bloom plugin.
  2. Select one or multiple text layers in your design where you want to insert random data.
  3. Choose a preferred data language and data type from the list.
  4. Click “Generate Data” and the plugin will instantly populate the selected text layers based on your set preferences.

accepted.name: Five Eight Bloom
accepted.description:
Exploring usability, interaction, and aesthetics to craft intuitive digital experiences. 

Sharing design files, prototypes, and experiments 🚀

plugins.tagline: Replace dummy text with real-world localized content (🇦🇿 🇺🇸 🇰🇿 🇰🇬 🇹🇷 🇹🇲 🇺🇿 +3)

plugins.name: Design Feedback Lite
plugins.description: Instantly review selected frames using core UX principles. Get structured feedback, radar scoring, and real-time insights — all powered by design psychology.
plugins.tagline: Instant UX feedback on your designs — backed by psychology.

126473.name: Design Feedback Lite
126473.description: Instantly review selected frames using core UX principles. Get structured feedback, radar scoring, and real-time insights — all powered by design psychology.
126473.release_notes:
✨ Viewport-aware analysis: Mobile and desktop designs now get context-appropriate feedback.

⚠️ Contrast issues now tiered: Low, medium, and high severity for better prioritization.

💡 Smart Mode improved: Skips system layers like status bars, navs, and menu bars.

🧠 Accessibility standard toggle: Choose between WCAG 2.1 AA and AAA.

🎯 Refined touch and text size rules: Based on device context and layer type.

🎨 Sleek new UI: Modern layout, grouped controls, and better legibility.

Small plugin. Big feedback. Smarter than ever.
126473.tagline: Instant UX feedback on your designs — backed by psychology.

plugins.name: Stockpress
plugins.description:
About

Welcome to the Stockpress plugin for Figma, where you can quickly find and add files from your Stockpress workspace to your Figma designs. Once ready, export Frames and images back to Stockpress - complete with Frame URLs for easy access to working files!


What is Stockpress?

Stockpress is a refreshingly simple Digital Asset Management system–for everyone. One centralized workspace to add, organize, collaborate on, and share files with unlimited users and teams.


How to get started:

  1. First, sign up for a Stockpress workspace (get started for free!)
  2. Upload or import your files and folders to get organized
  3. Install the Stockpress plugin for Figma and connect your account
  4. Easily add files from Stockpress to your Figma designs
  5. Export Frames, images, and/or Frame URLs back to Stockpress


For help, contact us through your in-workspace chat or email us at help@stockpress.co
plugins.tagline: Add files from your Stockpress workspace to your design and export Figma assets back once ready

plugins.name: Jam Session
plugins.description:
Jam Session lets you run inclusive activities in FigJam.

Start a session as a facilitator and let anybody join by sharing a QR code, unique link or session code. Take control of hybrid or in-person workshop facilities and make sure everyone can inclusively participate.


Learn more at www.jamsesh.xyz


How to use

  1. Start a session with the plugin. Set a timer, an activity prompt, and how you want notes to appear on the board.
  2. Share the QR code or a link with participants. Anybody can join your session on any device through our companion web-app.
  3. Watch submissions roll in. Wait until the timer finishes or end the session early. Affinity map, synth or destroy the results as you please.


Whether you're running an in-person workshop with a FigJam board as the source of truth, or doing something hybrid and just want to ensure everyone can contribute, Jam Session is the tool you never knew you needed.

  1. Keeps the fun alive in workshops
  2. Avoids firewall or laggy machine issues for diverse participants
  3. Gives you control of how submissions appear


Jam Session is in public beta.

A FigJam plugin with this many moving parts may have rough edges. If you find something weird or didn't work, please don't hesitate to reach out to the support email and we'll get right on it.

accepted.name: dano
accepted.description: i do design and design activities

plugins.tagline: Join FigJam activities from anywhere! Run sessions anybody can join from any device.

plugins.name: Layout Lab
plugins.description:
Transform your design workflow with automated layout perfection. This powerful plugin streamlines your design process by intelligently handling spacing, alignment, and organization – saving you valuable time while ensuring pixel-perfect results.


🎯 Key Features:

  1. Auto-Layout: Instantly structure frames and elements with intelligent automation
  2. Perfect Spacing: Apply consistent spacing between elements with a single click
  3. Smart Grouping: Organize similar frames and elements into clean, logical layouts
  4. Nested Layer Support: Apply consistent spacing across all layer depths
  5. Customizable Settings: Fine-tune spacing, gaps, and layout modes to match your needs


💪 Perfect For:

  1. UI/UX Designers creating complex interfaces
  2. Design teams maintaining consistency across projects
  3. Product designers working on component libraries
  4. Anyone looking to speed up their layout workflow


🚀 How It Works:

  1. Select the elements you want to organize
  2. Choose your preferred layout settings
  3. Let the plugin work its magic!


✨ Benefits:

  1. Save hours on manual layout adjustments
  2. Maintain consistent spacing throughout your designs
  3. Reduce time spent on repetitive tasks
  4. Create more professional, polished layouts
  5. Ensure design system compliance


🎨 Supported Features:

  1. Auto-spacing calculation
  2. Intelligent grouping
  3. Responsive layouts
  4. Multi-selection support
  5. Custom spacing presets
  6. Quick actions


Made with ❤️ by a designer for designers. We're constantly improving – your feedback helps make this plugin better for everyone!
plugins.tagline: Automate your design workflow with perfect spacing, smart grouping, and pixel-perfect layouts

115633.release_notes:
I'm excited to announce the latest updates to the Layout Lab Plugin! Here’s what’s new:

🚀 New Features:
Rectangles Added to Defined Node: Rectangles are now recognized as valid nodes and included in the auto-layout system.

🛠 Enhancements:
Horizontal Layout Improvements: Enhanced grouping of frames with similar Y positions (within a 3-pixel tolerance) into horizontal rows for better alignment.

📝 How to Use:
Rectangles: Select rectangles with other nodes and run the plugin.
Horizontal Layout: Select frames with similar Y positions for automatic grouping.

Thank you for using the Layout Lab Plugin! 🎨
115633.tagline: Automate your design workflow with perfect spacing, smart grouping, and pixel-perfect layouts

plugins.name: Padding Check
plugins.description: Are developers always at your back since your paddings are always not multiples of 4? This plugin solves this problem of yours where you can quickly identify the Figma frames with the said padding issues. The plugin has a very simple UI where we have info display section and 2 buttons. 1st button "Highlight frames" selects all problematic frames and brings them to your view (Shift+1) and the 2nd button "Mark frames" creates a red box around all the frames that have a padding issue. The good news is that this plugin works only for Auto layout frames and not for all frames thereby not giving you unwanted results. As a helper once the plugin is executed (either of the buttons used to find the frames with issues) The information section of the plugin UI displays the count of the frames with issues helping the user to quickly take account of the issue.
plugins.tagline: Are all paddings in your Figma file multiples of 4? Use this plugin to quickly identify if not!

The good news is that this plugin works only for Auto layout frames and not for all frames thereby not giving you unwanted results. As a helper once the plugin is executed (either of the buttons used to find the frames with issues) The information section of the plugin UI displays the count of the frames with issues helping the user to quickly take account of the issue.
134144.tagline: Are all paddings in your Figma file multiples of 4? Use this plugin to quickly identify if not!

plugins.name: Aero Glass Renderer
plugins.description:
This plugin will render an accurate Aero Glass effect based on the formula from Windows 7.


Usage Instructions:

  1. Create a rectangle of any size.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Configure the plugin's values.
  4. Press the "Render" button.


Feel free to use this plugin for any concepts/artwork.

plugins.name: Dynamic Typescales
plugins.description:
Dynamic Typescales


Automatically adjust tracking and leading across your typescale for better rhythm and readability. Tightens spacing for large text and loosens it for small text, with sliders to control intensity and inputs to set your base values. Say goodbye to tedious manual tweaking!


---


Feedback & Support

Feel free to tag me or say hi on LinkedIn or Twitter.

plugins.name: Translate Text with Gemini
plugins.description:
Translate Text with Gemini is a powerful yet lightweight Figma plugin that helps you quickly translate any selected text nodes into over 30 languages using Google’s Gemini AI.


✨ Key Features:

•Supports App Store Connect languages (e.g. French, Japanese, Arabic, Vietnamese, etc.)

•Smart deduplication — identical phrases are only translated once

•Structured output parsing to ensure accurate mapping

•Custom language support beyond the dropdown list

•Built for speed and scale (bulk translate entire Frames/Sections)


🔒 Your API key is safely stored per session.


Created with ❤️ by Giang Nguyen.
plugins.tagline: Effortless multilingual translation for your Figma designs.

128664.tagline: Effortless multilingual translation for your Figma designs.

plugins.name: flowwwww
plugins.description:
Streamline your workflows with flowwwww, the ultimate plugin for creating dynamic connectors between frames, components, and other objects in Figma. Whether you're designing user flows, wireframes, or complex diagrams, flowwwwwempowers you to create professional, customizable connections with ease.


Key Features

Intuitive Connector Creation

Select two frames or components, and flowwwww will instantly generate a connector between them.


Highly Customizable

Personalize your connectors with adjustable properties:

Stroke color and size.

Add text annotations to label your connectors for enhanced clarity.


Smart Obstacle Avoidance

Enable Obstacle Mode to automatically detect and avoid overlapping objects, ensuring clean and unobstructed connectors.

Perfect for complex designs where connectors need to navigate around other elements.



Use Cases

User Flows : Map out user journeys with clear, annotated connectors between screens.

Wireframing : Create structured layouts with precise connections between components.

Technical Diagrams : Build flowcharts, process maps, and other technical illustrations with ease.

Prototyping : Enhance your prototypes with interactive and visually appealing connectors.


How It Works

Install the flowwwww plugin from the Figma Community.

Select two frames, components, or rectangles that you want to connect.


Configure your connector settings (color, style, etc.) via the plugin interface.


Let flowwwww do the rest—watch as it creates beautiful, dynamic connectors that adapt to your design.


Why Choose flowwwww?

flowwwww is more than just a connector tool—it’s a productivity booster for designers who value precision, flexibility, and efficiency. With its robust feature set and seamless integration into Figma, flowwwww is the go-to solution for anyone looking to elevate their design workflow.


Feedback and Support

We’re committed to making flowwwww the best it can be! If you have any suggestions, encounter issues, or simply love the plugin, we’d love to hear from you. Leave a comment on the Figma Community page or reach out to us directly.


Get Started Today

Install flowwwww now and experience the power of effortless connector creation. Simplify your design process and bring your ideas to life with clarity and precision.
plugins.tagline: Effortless Connector Creation for Figma

plugins.name: Thumbnail Resizer
plugins.description:
Thumbnail Resizer streamlines the process of creating multiple sized thumbnails from a single design. With this plugin, you can:


  1. Quickly generate thumbnails in various preset sizes for popular platforms
  2. Create custom size presets for your specific needs
  3. Batch resize selected elements with just a few clicks
  4. Save and reuse your frequently used size combinations


Perfect for social media marketers, UI/UX designers, and anyone who needs to create multiple versions of their designs efficiently. Save time and ensure consistency across all your thumbnail sizes with Thumbnail Resizer.
plugins.tagline: Quick and easy thumbnail creation for multiple sizes

105554.name: Thumbnail Resizer
105554.description:

  1. Quickly generate thumbnails in various preset sizes for popular platforms
  2. Create custom size presets for your specific needs
  3. Batch resize selected elements with just a few clicks
  4. Save and reuse your frequently used size combinations


Perfect for social media marketers, UI/UX designers, and anyone who needs to create multiple versions of their designs efficiently. Save time and ensure consistency across all your thumbnail sizes with Thumbnail Resizer.
105554.tagline: Quick and easy thumbnail creation for multiple sizes

plugins.name: Text Color Pairs To Variables
plugins.description:
Usage

  1. Create a frame with any name.
  2. Inside the frame created in step 1, create another frame named variableColorItem.
  3. Inside variableColorItem, create a frame named variableColor.
  4. Set a fill color for variableColor.
  5. Within variableColorItem, create a text layer named variableName.
  6. Select the frame you created in step 1.
  7. Launch the plugin.
  8. Click the button.
  9. The color of variableColor will be registered as a local variable under the name variableName.
plugins.tagline: Generate variables from color and text combinations.

89740.name: Text Color Pairs To Variables
89740.description:
Usage

  1. Create a frame with any name.
  2. Inside the frame created in step 1, create another frame named variableColorItem.
  3. Inside variableColorItem, create a frame named variableColor.
  4. Set a fill color for variableColor.
  5. Within variableColorItem, create a text layer named variableName.
  6. Select the frame you created in step 1.
  7. Launch the plugin.
  8. Click the button.
  9. The color of variableColor will be registered as a local variable under the name variableName.

1. We have changed the plugin name.
2. We have changed the plugin cover image.
89740.tagline: Generate variables from color and text combinations.

plugins.name: Layer Organizer
plugins.description:
Layer Organizer

Is your Figma file a mess? Layers all over the place? Layer Organizer instantly organizes, groups, and aligns your selected layers — with real-time visual feedback.


🚀 Core Features:

  1. Auto Layer Organization: Instantly arranges and aligns selected layers for a clean, structured layout.
  2. Group Level Selection (1–5): Groups layers based on / in their names (e.g., Button/Primary), supporting deep hierarchies.
  3. Horizontal & Vertical Spacing: Set precise spacing between groups and layers. Quick presets: 200px, 400px, 1000px.
  4. Combine Single Layers: Merge single-layer groups into one clean “Ungrouped” group. Toggleable.


👀 Preview & Visualization:

  1. Real-Time Preview: See changes instantly as you organize.
  2. Group View: Visual list of group names and included layers, with type labels (Frame, Component, Vector, etc.).


⚙️ Settings & Shortcuts:

  1. Preference Memory: Automatically remembers your last settings for a smoother workflow.
  2. Default Values: Horizontal/Vertical spacing: 100px, Group level: 1, Combine single-layer groups: On.


⚡ Performance-First Architecture:

  1. Two-Stage Processing: Measures first, positions after — for faster, more accurate results.
  2. Safe Layer Sorting: Uses a temporary frame to reorder layers while preserving hierarchy and structure.


Organize! Preview! Perfect! 🧼
plugins.tagline: Auto-arrange and group layers for a cleaner, more organized Figma canvas. 🧼

plugins.name: Syntax Highlighter
plugins.description:
How to use


Applying syntax highlighting colors


  1. Select a text layer containing a code snippet.
  2. Choose a programming language, if required (the plugin will try to identify the language automatically).
  3. Choose a theme.
  4. Toggle include background and line numbers, if required.
  5. Click Apply.


Clearing syntax highlighting colors


  1. Select a text layer containing a formatted code snippet.
  2. Click the Clear formatting button.


Adding custom Visual Studio themes


  1. Open Visual Studio Code.
  2. Install the desired color theme and switch to the theme in Visual Studio Code.
  3. Press Ctrl + Shift + P and run Developer: Generate Color Theme from current settings.
  4. Select the file's contents and copy.
  5. Open the Figma plugin and press the Create a new theme button.
  6. Paste into the Create a new theme dialog and click Save.


Note: This plugin supports up to 10 custom themes.

accepted.name: Microsoft
accepted.description: The official account for Microsoft Design.

plugins.tagline: Apply syntax highlighting colors to code snippets.

134926.tagline: Apply syntax highlighting colors to code snippets.

plugins.name: PRE: AI Design Review
plugins.description:
PRE helps designers and product teams understand how users will interact with their UI designs — before a single line of code is written.


🔹 Select any frame in Figma and click “Upload Selected Frame” to send it to PRE.

🔹 PRE will automatically generate a heatmap, predict click-through rates, and provide UX suggestions using AI.

🔹 You can modify the generated tags, draw additional clickable elements, or toggle the heatmap overlay on and off using the second button in the top bar.

🔹 Once you're happy with the predictions, you can download the heatmap and click data for further analysis or presentation.


Whether you're working on early wireframes or high-fidelity mocks, PRE helps you make design decisions backed by predictive user analytics — all from right inside Figma.


Powered by PRE
plugins.tagline: Export any Figma frame and instantly generate heatmaps, CTR predictions and UX feedback with PRE.

138599.name: PRE: AI Design Review
138599.description:

🔹 Once you're happy with the predictions, you can download the heatmap and click data for further analysis or presentation.


Whether you're working on early wireframes or high-fidelity mocks, PRE helps you make design decisions backed by predictive user analytics — all from right inside Figma.


Powered by PRE
138599.tagline: Export any Figma frame and instantly generate heatmaps, CTR predictions and UX feedback with PRE.

plugins.name: Ting-Image
plugins.description:
Ting Image—One-click compression, instant format conversion. Switch between PNG, JPEG, WEBP, AVIF for smaller, optimized images. Efficiency meets ease!

1. Efficient Compression

Advanced algorithms reduce image size while preserving quality, saving storage and speeding up load times.

2. Multi-Format Conversion

Instantly switch between PNG, JPEG, WEBP, and AVIF formats to fit any design or development need.

3. Batch Processing

Process multiple images at once to save time and boost productivity.

4. Smart Preview

Real-time previews let you compare and control compression quality effortlessly.

5. Seamless Integration

Works directly within Figma, keeping your design workflow smooth and uninterrupted.

6. Lightweight & Stable

Runs efficiently without slowing down Figma, ensuring a seamless experience.


Thank you for your support

@Wiley Shaw @v-huanghaolan
plugins.tagline: Export PNG, JPEG, WEBP, AVIF,

plugins.name: BANCONE
plugins.description: BANCONE is a Software-as-a-Service platform powered by an integrated suite of AI-driven tools that simplify, optimize, and improve the quality of Human-Machine Interaction (HMI) design and development. Initially focused on the automotive sector, specifically software-defined vehicles, the platform is designed to expand to other industrial domains in the future. BANCONE transforms how automotive teams create and implement sophisticated cockpit interfaces, leveraging artificial intelligence to automate routine tasks, detect issues early, and generate innovative design solutions.
plugins.tagline: BANCONE is a Software-as-a-Service platform powered by an integrated suite of AI-driven tools

plugins.name: Set Gradient Style
plugins.description:
The plugin allows you to transfer the parameters of a new gradient to previously published styles, simplifying the process of manually transferring angles and breakpoints. This may be necessary if you need to update the current style, but doing it manually will cause.


  1. Select a Frame, Rectangle or Vector with a new gradient
  2. Write local style name which you want to update
  3. Press "Set style"

plugins.name: C2O - Clutter to Organised
plugins.description:
C2O (Clutter to Organized) is a simple and effective Figma plugin that helps designers automatically arrange frames into a structured layout. If your Figma file feels cluttered, C2O will neatly organize everything in just one click.


✨ How It Works:

1️⃣ Rename your frames with a prefix inside square brackets.

Example:

[1a] Login Page (Row 1, Frame A)

[1b] Password Entry (Row 1, Frame B)

[2a] Dashboard (Row 2, Frame A)

2️⃣ Run the plugin and click "Organize Frames".

3️⃣ Your frames will be arranged into clearly structured groups, placed in order from top to bottom.

Frames without the naming pattern will be placed in an "Others" group at the bottom.


💡 Why Use C2O?

Eliminates manual alignment work and saves time.

Keeps designs structured and easy to navigate.

Improves team collaboration by maintaining a clean layout.

Click “Try it out” and bring order to your Figma files effortlessly! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Structure your Figma frames in One Click!

plugins.name: Side note
plugins.description:
Meet Side Note, your minimalist companion for organizing thoughts, ideas, and to-dos in style. Side Note is designed for simplicity, focus, and seamless integration with your creative workflow. Whether you're jotting down quick ideas or capturing important notes, Side Note keeps everything neat and accessible.


Key Features:


  1. Customizable Notes: Add titles, content, and importance labels to make each note unique.
  2. Smart Sizing: Flexible vertical layouts with precise padding for a polished design.
  3. Intuitive Interface: Clean, modern UI for a distraction-free note-taking experience.
  4. Important Labeling: Highlight key notes with an elegant "Important" tag for quick prioritization.
  5. Effortless Integration: Built for seamless use within Figma, perfect for designers on the go.
plugins.tagline: Quick Notes, Seamless Workflow.

plugins.name: Adtraction Table Generator
plugins.description:
A specialized Figma plugin designed exclusively for Adtraction employees to streamline the process of converting complex Excel reports into presentation-ready Figma tables.


Key Features:

  1. 📊 Automatically splits large Excel files into separate tables
  2. 🎯 Purpose-built for Adtraction's reporting structure:
  3. Koncern (Group) tables
  4. Moderbolag (Parent company) tables
  5. Other financial data tables
  6. 🎨 Maintains Adtraction's brand typography with Lexend font
  7. 🔍 Preview tables before generation
  8. ⚡️ Bulk processing of multiple tables from a single Excel file
  9. 🔒 Local processing for data security


Perfect Use Case:

Designed specifically for Adtraction's quarterly and annual financial reporting workflow. When you have one large Excel file containing multiple tables of financial data, this plugin automatically:

  1. Identifies different table sections
  2. Splits them into separate tables
  3. Applies appropriate styling based on table type (koncern/moderbolag)
  4. Generates all tables with consistent formatting


Ideal for:

  1. Adtraction financial team members
  2. Corporate communications staff
  3. Anyone working with Adtraction's financial reports in Figma

This is a niche tool optimized for Adtraction's specific needs, making the process of converting financial Excel data into presentation-ready Figma tables quick and consistent.


Note: This plugin is primarily intended for Adtraction employees and is optimized for their internal Excel report format and brand guidelines.
plugins.tagline: Transform Adtraction Excel reports into perfectly formatted Figma tables  ✨

122852.release_notes:
Adjust z-index values for UI overlay elements

- Increase z-index for modal and overlay components
- Ensure proper stacking of UI elements across different views
- Prevent potential rendering conflicts with higher z-index values

plugins.name: Upload MP
plugins.description:
Данный плагин предназначен для загрузки изображений из Figma напрямую в карточки товаров на OZON, Yandex.Market и Wildberries.


Для работы плагина требуется подписка.

Подписка - 999 руб. в месяц.

Оплата по платежной ссылке. Возможна оплата за 1, 6, и 12 месяцев.

Для получения ссылки, пожалуйста, свяжитесь с @uploadmp в Telegram.

plugins.name: Simple text generator

plugins.tagline: A simple text generator for scaling design

109546.name: Simple text generator
109546.description: A simple tool that lets designers input a string variable to generate scalable text across their designs.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin does not require network access.

109546.release_notes:
Version 2.0.0 Updates:
- Added support for multiple independent counters
- Use {n1}, {n2}, {n3} etc. for different number sequences
- All counters increment automatically
- Maintained backward compatibility with {n} syntax
- Improved error handling and performance
109546.tagline: A simple text generator for scaling design

plugins.name: Figma2JSON
plugins.description: Built for Juspay's innovative ecosystem, this Figma plugin transforms design layouts into JSON tailored for the Component Builder. It streamlines the creation of UI by directly converting Figma designs into structured JSON, enabling efficient and accurate UI generation.
